resources:
Zalp strel Zalp strel v nebol'shoy oblasti, kotoryy zamochit vse chto tam yest'
Natisk Bystryy natisk dlya stremitel'nogo sblizheniya s vragom.
Otpor falangi Tyazhelyy udar falangi, probivayushchiy dazhe samuyu sil'nuyu bronyu. Odnako takoy udar istoshchayet voinov i im nuzhno nekotoroye vremya chtoby perevesti dukh. Pervyy etap Tyazhelyy udar falangi, probivayushchiy dazhe samuyu sil'nuyu bronyu Vtoroy etap Takoy udar istoshchayet voinov i im nuzhno nekotoroye vremya chtoby perevesti dukh.
Udar shchitom Sokrushitel'nyy udar shchitom, sposobnyy povalit' na nogi lyubogo voina. Pervyy etap Sokrushitel'nyy udar shchitom, sposobnyy povalit' na nogi lyubogo voina. Vtoroy etap Takoy udar otkryvayet uyazvimyye mesta voinov i im nuzhno nekotoroye vremya perestroitsya obratno.
Splotit' ryady! Voiny uplotnyayut stroy, uvelichivaya zashchitu, no zhertvuya skorost'yu.
Pilumy Pilumy - metatel'noye oruzhiye. Namnogo tyazheleye strel, chto pozvolyayet legko probivat' bronyu, no kinut' ikh mozhno sovsem nedaleko, i tol'ko po pryamoy trayektorii. Legkiye pilumy Metatel'noye oruzhiye. Oblegchennyy variant obychnykh pilumov. Letyat dal'she, mozhno vzyat' s soboy bol'she shtuk, no uron skvoz' dospekhi men'she. Mozhno kinut' tol'ko po pryamoy trayektorii. Tyazholyye pilumy Metatel'noye oruzhiye. Namnogo tyazheleye obychnykh pilumov. Letyat na men'sheye rasstoyaniye, mozhno vzyat' men'she shtuk, no uron skvoz' dospekhi namnogo bol'she. Mozhno kinut' tol'ko po pryamoy trayektorii. Sbalansirovannyye pilumy Metatel'noye oruzhiye s zakalennym i zatochennym nakonechnikom. Proshivayet bronyu naskvoz'. Mozhno kinut' tol'ko po pryamoy trayektorii.
Arrow Volley A volley of arrows in a small area that soaks all that is there
Onslaught A quick onslaught for a quick rapprochement with the enemy.
Repulse phalanx A heavy phalanx punch that breaks through even the strongest armor. However, such a blow depletes the warriors and they need some time to take a breath. First step A heavy phalanx punch piercing even the strongest armor Second Stage Such a blow exhausts the warriors and they need some time to take a breath.
Shield Bash A crushing blow with a shield that can knock any warrior down. First step A crushing blow with a shield capable of knocking down any warrior. Second Stage Such a blow opens the warriors' vulnerabilities and they need some time to be rebuilt.
pull together rows! Warriors tighten their ranks, increasing defence, but sacrificing speed.
Pilos Pilums are throwing weapons. Much heavier than arrows, which makes it easy to pierce armor, but you can throw them very close, and only along a straight path. Lightweight sawmills Throwing weapons. Lightweight version of ordinary pilum. They fly further, you can take more pieces with you, but the damage through the armor is less. You can only throw in a straight path. Heavy duty sawmills Throwing weapons. Much heavier than ordinary pilums. Fly a smaller distance, you can take fewer pieces, but the damage through the armor is much more. You can only throw in a straight path. Balanced Pilum A throwing weapon with a hardened and sharpened tip. Stitches through armor. You can only throw in a straight path.
Sozvat' opolcheniye Sozvat' opolcheniye i vooruzhit' lukami. Teper' vy smozhete vyzyvat' liven' strel na ukazannuyu territoriyu. Bol'shoy luk Vooruzhit' luchnikov bol'shimi lukami. Strely, vypushchennyye s takogo luka nanosyat namnogo bol'she urona. Utyazhelit' strely Prikazat' luchnikam utyazhelit' nakonechniki svoikh strel. Takiye strely budut nanosit' bol'she urona. Zatochit' strely Prikazat' luchnikam zatochit' nakonechniki svoikh strel. Takiye strely budut luchshe probivat' bronyu. Zakalennyye strely Vooruzhit' luchnikov strelami s zakalennymi nakonechnikami. Takiye strely ne ostanovyat dazhe samyye luchshiye dospekhi. Nabrat' rekrutov Nabrat' novykh rekrutov. Teper' dazhe solntse zakroyetsya ogromnoy tuchey vypushchennykh strel. Shire stroy! Rassredotochit' ryady. Eto pozvolit snaryadit' luchnikov boleye moshchnymi lukami. Orlinyy glaz Obuchit' luchnikov tochnoy strel'be na bol'shiye rasstoyaniya. Eto uvelichit kuchnost' strel'by. Bystryye ruki Obuchit' luchnikov tekhnike bystroy perezaryadki. Eto pozvolit strelyat' chashche.
Trenirovat' natisk Obuchit' soldat v otryade, po komande, bystro uskoryat'sya i sbivat' vragov s nog, nanosya im uron svoim oruzhiyem. Bol'she trenirovok! Trenirovat' soldat yeshcho i yeshcho, poka oni ne stanut begat' bystreye. Oblegchennaya obuv' Boleye legkaya obuv' pozvolit begat' yeshcho bystreye. Beg na malyye distantsii Trenirovat' bystryy beg na malyye distantsii, chto povysit maksimal'nuyu skorost' bega. Beg na bol'shiye distantsii Trenirovat' bystryy beg na bol'shiye distantsii, chto povysit prodolzhitel'nost' natiska. Ukrepit' podoshvu Luchsheye stsepleniye s zemley pozvolit' bystreye uskoryat'sya. Nizkiy start Trenirovat' beg s nizkogo starta. Eto pozvolit povysit' uskoreniye natiska. Intensivnyye trenirovki Intensivnyye trenirovki pozvolyat soldatam bystreye perevodit' dukh posle bega. Skorost' perezaryadki umeniya sokratitsya. Udar na begu Trenirovat' udar oruzhiyem na begu. Eto pozvolit nanosit' bol'she urona pri stolknovenii s vragom. Развернуть 4691/5000 Convene militia Convene a militia and arm with bows. Now you can call a shower of arrows on the specified territory. Big bow Arm the archers with large bows. Arrows released from such a bow deal much more damage. Buff the arrows Order the archers to weight their arrowheads. These arrows will do more damage. Sharpen Arrows Order the archers to sharpen the tips of their arrows. Such arrows will better pierce armor. Hardened Arrows Arm the archers with arrows with hardened tips. Such arrows will not stop even the best armor. Recruit recruits Recruit new recruits. Now even the sun will close with a huge cloud of arrows. Wider! Spread out rows. This will equip archers with more powerful bows. Eagle eye Train archers in accurate shooting over long distances. This will increase the accuracy of shooting. Quick Hands Train archers in quick reloading. This will allow you to shoot more often.
Train the onslaught Train a soldier in a squadron, on command, to accelerate quickly and knock enemies off their feet, causing damage to them with their weapons. More workouts! Train the soldiers again and again until they run faster. Lightweight shoes Lighter shoes allow you to run even faster. Running for a short distance Train fast running for short distances, which will increase the maximum running speed. Long-distance running Train fast running over long distances, which will increase the duration of the onslaught. Strengthen the sole Better ground adhesion to allow faster acceleration. Low start Practice running from a low start. This will increase the acceleration of the onslaught. Intensive training Intense training will allow soldiers to quickly catch their breath after running. The recharge speed of the skill will decrease. Kick on the Run Train with a weapon strike while running. This will do more damage when encountering an enemy.
Repulse phalanx To train a piercing blow with a spear, in phalanx construction. With a successful performance, nobody will survive such a blow! Beat stronger! To train the force of impact. More power - more damage Intense training Intensive training will allow the fighters to recover faster from exertion, which means - TO BE BREATHING. Bei more accurate! Exercise hit accuracy. This will allow strikes in vulnerable spots. Now even the best armor will not save the enemy from his fate! Change rack Train a quick change of post after a strike. This will level the slowdown More, more workouts! Need to recover faster in battle? So you need to train more outside of combat!
Shield Bash The shield is not only armor, but also an excellent weapon! A heavy blow with a shield is able to knock down any opponent. Beat stronger! Train your strike force. More power - more damage Intense training Intense training will allow the fighters to recover faster after exertion, which means - TO BE BLASTING. Bei more accurate! Train your hit accuracy. This will allow strikes in vulnerable spots. Now even the best armor will not save the enemy from his fate! Change rack Train a quick change of post after a strike. This will cover the vulnerabilities previously covered by the shield More, more workouts! Need to recover faster in battle? So you need to train more outside of combat!
Splic the rows The tighter the build, the easier it is to resist the enemy! Intense training Intense training will allow the fighters to recover faster from exertion. Cover your neighbor! Debug the interaction of soldiers in the ranks, which will give a big increase in the protection of the entire squad! Dead Stand In such a rack, no one moves. But to face such a stand on the run is more expensive Maneuvering Coach movement in tight rows. This will greatly increase the speed of movement in such a construction. Solid soil Soldiers will be able to enjoy all the benefits of the soil, which will allow them to gain speed more effectively when moving More, more workouts! Need more endurance in battle? So you need to train more outside of combat!
